戝字的基本解释

戝
zéi
古同“贼”。

戝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zéi］
［《廣韻》昨則切，入德，從。］
亦作“戝1”。“贼1”的繁体字。
(1)败坏；毁坏。
(2)谗毁。
(3)害；伤害。
(4)杀戮；杀害。亦指杀人者。
(5)祸害。
(6)谓对国家、人民、社会道德风尚造成严重危害的人。
(7)抢劫或偷窃财物的人。
(8)偷窃。
(9)诈伪；狡黠。
(10)邪辟不正。参见“賊心”、“賊相”。
(11)詈词。
(12)暴虐，狠毒。
(13)克，制约。
(14)方言。很，十分。表示程度相当高。多用于贬义。
(15)一种专食苗节的害虫。

戝字的康熙字典解释

【備考】【卯集】【戈字部】　戝； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页413第06
【篇海類編】同賊。

戝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
戝字的起名意思

暂无。

戝
Basic explanation of words
戝
zéi
Gu Tong "thief".
戝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zéi］
["Guangyun" cut yesterday, enter Germany, follow. ]
Also known as "戝1". "Thief 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Corruption; destruction.
(2) Slander.
(3) Harm; harm.
(4) Killing; killing. Also refers to the murderer.
(5) Harm.
(6) Those who have caused serious harm to the country, people, and social morals.
(7) People who rob or steal property.
(8) Stealing.
(9) Fraud; cunning.
(10) Evil is not right. See "Thief Heart", "Thief Phase".
(11) Literary words.
(12) Tyrannical and vicious.
(13) Gram, restriction.
(14) Dialects. Very, very much. The degree of expression is quite high. Mostly used in derogatory sense.
(15) A pest that specializes in seedling festival.
戝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Remarks] [Mao Ji] [Ge Zi Department] 　戝; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 413 06
[Articles of sea category] the same thief.
